mapper.select: select rent.rent_no , rent.lcns_idntf_cd , rent.vhcl_reg_no , TO_CHAR(rent.rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_bgng_dt , TO_CHAR(rent.rent_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_end_dt , rent.rent_stts_cd , rent.vrfc_hstry_sn , rent.rgtr_sn , rent.reg_dt , rent.mdfcn_dt , rent.dln from dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent rent where 1=1 and rent.rent_stts_cd = '2' and rent.del_yn = 'N' and rent.rent_no = #{rentNo}
